data.name: ReadAlert
data.value: select top(1) CONTROL_NUMBER, NAME, MESSAGE, DESCRIPTION, EXTERNAL_INDICATOR from CKT_ALERT where CONTROL_NUMBER = cast(@count as integer)

data.name: ReadCaseCaseRole
data.value: select T1.CLOSURE_REASON, T1.NUMB, T1.STATUS, T1.STATUS_DATE, T2.CSP_NUMBER, T2.TYPE, T2.CASE_ROLE_ID, T2.START_DATE, T2.END_DATE from CKT_CASE T1 join CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 on (@cspNumber = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.START_DATE <= @startDate) and (T2.END_DATE >= @startDate) and (T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NUMBER) order by T1.NUMB desc

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadInterstateRequest
data.value: select top(1) IDENTIFIER, KS_CASE_IND, CAS_I_NUMBER from CKT_INTERSTAT_RQST where @casINumber = CAS_I_NUMBER
